title: Youth Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions: Easy interview process that allows for you to generate conversation to properly express and get to the root of why you have a heart for youth and why you want to work with them.
Interview Questions: Why do you think youth find themselves in juvenile delinquency issues?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at The Link (Minneapolis, MN) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Received a phone call requesting time for a phone interview. Interviewed with potential supervisor. Was invited to come in for an in person interview with supervisor and the program director. Received a call a week later, was offered the position and accepted.
Interview Questions: What does cultural competence mean to you?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at The Link (Minneapolis, MN)
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by HR to set up an interview time. I came to the office and met with my potential supervisor for about a half hour. They called me about a week later requesting a second interview. I went to the office again and met with my potential supervisor and his/her supervisor as well for about a half hour. HR called a week or so later with an offer.
Interview Questions: Talk about a time you have disagreed with somebody at work.
